product_name: Native Eyewear Haskill Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The classic styling and advanced lenses of the women's Haskill Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear take you through many a road trip as well as adventures off-road. Gray-tinted N3(TM) lenses block 88% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Rhyno-Tuff(R) Air frames made from durable thermoplastic material can withstand high-velocity collisions and temperature swings. Cushionol(TM) nose pads and temple boots and Mastoid(TM) temple grips keep glasses on comfortably while you're active. Cam-action hinges let temples quickly lock into position. Native Eyewear Haskill Polarized Sunglasses for women best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: The classic styling and advanced lenses of the women's Haskill Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear take you through many a road trip as well as adventures off-road.
